abstract: Microsoft and WPP may be considering swapping components of two richly valued online advertising deals that they struck last year, mergers that in hindsight seem far too pricey, according to Advertising Age.
snippet: Microsoft and WPP may be considering swapping components of two richly valued online advertising deals that they struck last year, mergers that in hindsight seem far too pricey, according to Advertising Age.
lead_paragraph: Could Microsoft and WPP help each other out of two acquisitions that in retrospect seem highly overvalued?

headline.main: Microsoft, WPP May Eye Online Advertising Swap
